originalText.text: We finally researched roofing contractors in NYC after years of patchwork to replace our deck extension flat roof. Royal was priced in the middle of the other quotes, but we thought it was the most professional. They arrived in one day, replaced the roof, and everything was perfect. I'd hire them again.

text.text: We finally researched roofing contractors in NYC after years of patchwork to replace our deck extension flat roof. Royal was priced in the middle of the other quotes, but we thought it was the most professional. They arrived in one day, replaced the roof, and everything was perfect. I'd hire them again.

originalText.text:
After comparing reviews, qualifications and prices, I chose Royal Roofing & Siding NYC for a complete roof and gutter replacement.  They are GAF certified, and follow a proven 5-step process (if you don't know was GAF is, you should look it up before hiring a contractor).

As for my experience, in a few words, they were professional and accommodating from start to finish - operating at a level of attention to detail that more than satisfies the most particular person.  Communication was prompt, the planning seamless, and the execution was done swiftly (1-day) and thoroughly. The clean up afterwards was especially impressive; it's as if nothing happened, as there was no evidence of a big construction job.  It should be noted, I was there to monitor/supervise the entire job from start to finish, and in summary, I am pleased with their workmanship. Living in the Manhattan area I come across a lot of contracting companies. I can therefore vouch that these guys are way above standard.

The only issues were the neighbors complaining, and car that was precariously parked right in front of our home, which made things less than convenient, but the workers (9 of them) were extra careful.  A general tip for homeowners planning on doing big construction job is to advise neighbors and warn vehicle owners of parking within the vicinity of the site - we did this, but it was not only too short notice, but the effort was inadequate (notes/signs/proper notification would have been more helpful in my case).

Highly recommend this company for anyone searching for Roofing in the five boroughs. I believe they have offices in Manhattan, Queens & Brooklyn which makes it very convenient for anyone in NYC.  Ask for Sean, he was our project manager, and was fantastic.

originalText.text: First I want to thank Sean for a job well done! Royal Roofing NYC was recommended to me by a friend who hired to them replace their vinyl siding. I needed a professional roofing company to replace my old roof in uptown manhattan property. They were prompt in answering the phone and provided good quality roofing system with warranty so we selected them. After a full day the roof was replaced and we were back to normal. These guys are truly amazing roofers. Thanks guys

Royal was priced in the middle of the other quotes but was the most professional in our opinion. They came and replaced the roof in 1 day and everything came out perfect. Would use them again.

originalText.text: Best roofing company in Manhattan. Royal Roofing did an unbelievable job on my brownstone in uptown NYC, tearing off the old flat roof with 5 layers and install a new one in 1 day. Not many companies come in uniform with 18 guys and a foreman and project manager ready to rumble at 7:30am. I am highly impressed and now would recommend Royal Roofing for anyone in NYC needing roofing or siding work. Thank you guys!
